item.title: Winter 2020
item.description: Why I took Winter 2020 off? -- Why I took Winter 2020 off? For the past three years, as a University of Waterloo student, I have gotten the opportunity to partake in four different co-ops/internships alternating between school terms. I have found these experiences to be so invaluable to my learnings as an engineering student and just as a human and I am so grateful for each one of them.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Heya! This is my little corner of the internet :) I hope you take a gander around and explore!
